articles.author: Scroll Staff
articles.title: Coronavirus can survive on human skin for up to nine hours, shows study - Scroll.in
articles.description: Scientists found that the pathogen that causes the flu survives on human skin for about 1.8 hours by comparison.
articles.content: Researchers in Japan have found that the coronavirus can survive on human skin for up to nine hours, offering further proof that regular handwashing can curb the spread of Covid-19, according to a st… [+2851 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Coronavirus | Government panel claims COVID-19 has peaked in India, can be controlled by February - The Hindu
articles.description: The 10-member panel, chaired by IIT Hyderabad professor M. Vidyasagar, says no fresh lockdowns should be imposed on district or State level unless there is an imminent danger of healthcare facilities being overwhelmed.
articles.content: No fresh lockdowns should be imposed on district or State level to contain the spread of COVID-19 unless there is an imminent danger of healthcare facilities being overwhelmed, according to a governm… [+4359 chars]
